title: Youkaiden Nekome Kozou (Cat Eyed Boy)
synopsis: The story is told by the cat-eyed boy, hated by humans and demons, who engages in tales of terror, including monsters and children.
staff: [['Watanabe, Chuumei', ['Theme Song Composition', ' Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Columbia Yurikago Kai', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Umezu, Kazuo', ['Original Creator']]]
